resources.string: Write down 5 things you’re grateful for
Stay off social media for 2 hours
Watch something you love and relax
Write one goal for this week
Today I choose a fresh start. I release the weight of yesterday, and I welcome new energy, new thoughts, and new possibilities into my life
My body is a gift, and I honor it with care. Every sip I take is a reminder that I am nurturing myself from the inside out
“Gratitude opens my heart. I notice the good around me, and I invite more blessings into my life with appreciation and awareness
I create the environment I want to live in. As I bring order to my space, I bring clarity and calm to my life
I allow myself to rest and enjoy the small joys of life. I don’t have to earn relaxation — I deserve it simply because I am human
I move through life with intention. Even one clear goal has the power to change my direction and bring me closer to the future I want
Creativity flows through me. I don’t have to be perfect; I only have to express myself and enjoy the process of becoming
I am moving forward, step by step, physically and emotionally. Progress is progress, no matter how small it looks.”
My mind deserves nourishment. With every page, I grow, I learn, and I evolve into a wiser version of myself
“I am becoming stronger in my body and mind. I show up for myself even when it’s hard, because I deserve to feel powerful and alive
